data.text: @JCnot4me But we know that she has the brains of the family
@JCnot4me Circular reasoning. Convincing yourself there is no possible way to lose...
@JCnot4me It should come with an addiction warning label like cigarette packets.
@craigo001 Similar situation here re discussion about it. She's happy being hooked on JeJuice. And that beats booze or coke

@JCnot4me I feel your frustration, I’m in a similar situation with my wife although she doesn’t really “practice “ her religion she just wants to believe it. Mine just refuses to discuss it. I feel she has zero interest in if it’s true or not, is yours the same?

@JCnot4me @SirProfOfPun There’s nothing wrong with marriage 🙄 . It’s not for everyone, but those who are married or would like to be shouldn’t be shamed. 

I unfollowed and muted that guy. What an ass.
@JCnot4me @DeityFree Apologies for anything I said that may be construed as possibly very rude… it’s likely more my depression than my autism that makes me so insufferably cynical.

@craigo001 Excellent point! When I've brought up similar things to her, she then switches to something like "well, the V's are also harmful and k*ll people, and we're not supposed to deliberately harm our bodies- our temples"
@SirProfOfPun @DeityFree I agree, but marriage was mandatory in her book if we were to continue, so I compromised.
